metaGetData.AdditInfo: ORACLE_HOME must follow a standard for automation purposes
metaGetData.Query: select SYS_CONTEXT ('USERENV','ORACLE_HOME') AS VALUE,'$VALUE$ is not ExpectedValue.' as FAILMSG from dual
metaGetData.FailureMessage: ORACLE_HOME is not following OMS standards

metaGetData.Query: select display_value as VALUE,'$VALUE$ is not ExpectedValue.' as FAILMSG from v$parameter where name='processes'
